layout.title: Admin Panel
layout.description: This is a restricted area. Changes here affect the entire platform.

dashboard.title: Welcome to the Admin Dashboard
dashboard.description: Select a module from the sidebar to manage platform content and settings.
dashboard.content: From here you can manage articles, courses, and other platform-wide information.

toast.loadErrorDescription: Could not retrieve the list of articles. Please check the console.
toast.createSuccessDescription: The new knowledge article has been saved.
toast.createErrorDescription: Could not create the new article.

allArticles.title: All Knowledge Articles
allArticles.description: Manage all blog posts, news, and educational content.

table.title: Title
table.noArticles: No articles found. Create one to get started.

createArticle.title: Create New Content
createArticle.description: Add a new article to the knowledge base. Content in one language will be auto-translated to the other.
createArticle.categoryPlaceholder: e.g., Blog, Industry News, KNF Guide

createCourse.title: Create New Course
createCourse.description: Add a new educational course to the platform.

hero.title: Connecting the World of Agriculture with {appName}
hero.subtitle: A unified platform for farmers, buyers, and experts to network, trade, and grow together.

features.title: Core Features
features.subtitle: DamDoh provides the tools you need to succeed in the agricultural supply chain.

networking.title: Smart Networking
networking.description: AI-powered connection suggestions to expand your professional network.

marketplace.title: Global Marketplace
marketplace.description: A direct sales channel to connect farmers with buyers and service providers.

forums.title: Thematic Forums
forums.description: Share knowledge and discuss specific topics with agricultural communities.

talent.title: Talent Exchange
talent.description: A job board to offer and find specialized agricultural services.

forWho.title: Built for the Entire Supply Chain
forWho.description: DamDoh is designed to empower every stakeholder, from the field to the final consumer.

farmers.title: Farmers
farmers.description: Access new markets, gain knowledge on sustainable practices, and manage your farm efficiently.

buyers.title: Buyers & Processors
buyers.description: Source high-quality, traceable produce directly from producers and cooperatives.

experts.title: Experts & Service Providers
experts.description: Offer your skills, from agronomy to logistics, and connect with a global client base.

forWho.imageAlt: A diverse group of agricultural stakeholders collaborating

cta.title: Join the DamDoh Community Today
cta.subtitle: Start building your network, showcasing your products, and growing your business on a global scale.

StartPost.placeholder: Start a post, share an update, or ask a question...

FeedItemCard.signInToLikeToast: You must be signed in to like a post.
FeedItemCard.signInToVoteToast: You must be signed in to vote.

DashboardRightSidebar.infoTooltip: These suggestions are AI-powered based on your profile and platform activity.
DashboardRightSidebar.signInPrompt: Sign in to get personalized suggestions.
DashboardRightSidebar.promotionsDescription: Create and manage coupons for your marketplace items.
DashboardRightSidebar.adDescription: Unlock premium insights on market prices, demand forecasts, and supply chain analytics.

AppFooter.tagline: The Global Agricultural Supply Chain Platform.
